title: Collaborative Reflection and Co-Learning Program for Building University Collaboration Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic collaborative project experience and practical elementary education fieldwork background
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen university-industry collaboration network development capabilities for in-service professionals, emphasizing real-time collaboration and reflective practice using digital devices.

learning_goals: Participants can apply three reflective practice frameworks for designing collaborative networks.
Participants can develop and present one university-industry collaborative learning scenario using collaboration tools.
Participants can write and share five systematic reflective journals for collaborative problem-solving in online environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
